alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 8:53PM CDT until August 03 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 753 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunol, or 15 miles northeast of Sidney, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lodgepole and Sunol. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 67 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
